Vagrant.configure("2") do |config|
	if Vagrant::Util::Platform.windows?
		system "vagrant plugin install vagrant-winnfsd" unless Vagrant.has_plugin? "vagrant-winnfsd"
	end
	config.vm.box = "bento/centos-6.9"
	config.vm.box_version = "201708.22.0"
	config.vm.network :forwarded_port, host: 8984, guest: 8983
	config.vm.network :private_network, ip: "192.168.50.6"
	config.vm.synced_folder ".", "/sv", mount_options:["fmode=777,dmode=777"]
	config.vm.provider "virtualbox" do |v|
		v.memory = 1024
		v.customize ["modifyvm", :id, "--audio", "none"]
	end
end
